"Christmas phoenix!":
"When we talk about Christmas, there is cake!
When we talk about cake? There are the
three Naura sisters right?
With this, I have made reservations with
everybody's favourite Naura's Confectionery!
Even now, it is elusive, and should be somewhere
amongst some planet out there,
making hectic preparations. If you happen to
see them in some difficulty, please help them!"

"クリスマスといったらケーキ！
ケーキといえば？　ナウラ三姉妹でしょ。
というわけで、みんな大好きナウラの
ケーキ屋さんに予約を入れたのよ！
今もどこかの惑星に神出鬼没しながら
てんてこ舞いで準備しているはずだから
もし彼女たちが困っているのを見かけたら
助けてあげてね！"
